titleStmt.title: SII 7.470: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 470. (A.R. No. 255 of 1901). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti . śrīmanmahāmaṇḍaliśvaraN ArirāyaviphāṭaN phāṣaikkuttappum Irāyarakaṇṭaṉ muvarāyarakaṇṭaṉ virapokkaṇauṭaiyaṟkuc cellāniṉṟa śakāpdaM 1000 2 100 9 10 8lmel naḷavaruṣattu makaranāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu pūrṇaiyuM veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum vaidhṛtiyogamum peṟṟa puṇarpūcattu nāḷ
jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu kaḷattūṟkoṭṭattu śrīmadhurān=takaścaturvvetimaṅkalattu taṉiyūr tiruvaicciṟupākkattu Uṭaiyār Āṭcikoṇṭaruḷiya nāyaṉār koyiṟ śrīpaṇṭārattāṟku Acciṟupākkapaṟṟu teṉpākkappaṟṟu mulaippaṟṟu Ūrkaḷil tiruvacciṟupākkam ceyyāṟṟilveṉṟāṉ puḷiuṇi veḷḷarippaṭṭu Inta nālūrum nikki paṇiĀḷ
kaḷukku Āḷukku niṉṟa Ūrkaḷil nāṭṭā rupaiyamāka kaikkoṇṭapaṭi nāṅkaḷ cantrātittavaraikkum tirumalai pitakkaṇampāṭi veṭṭaikku naṭattuvatākak kaikkoṇṭu Eṅkaḷukku tanta tirumukappaṭikku nāṅkaḷ naṭattumpaṭi tirumalaiyil nālu tiruvitiyum 3 10 Aṭikku muppatu Aṭi kaṭṭaiyum muḷḷum paṟittup pokaṭṭu Āṟu maṭamum kaṭṭi kāvaṇamum
Iṭṭu maṇalum parappi tirumeṟkaṭṭiyum kaṭṭi maṭaṅkaḷtoṟum Amutu pāṉai caṭṭi tirumañcaṉakkuṭam cālkarakam Erikarumpu Ivaiyum veṇṭuvaṉa kuṟai vaṟuttu Inta Upaiyattukku Amutupaṭi kaṟiamutu Upamutu miḷakamutu pālneyamutu Aṭaikkāy IlaiAmutu veccaAmutu piṭṭaAmutu tiruppaṇiĀram maṟṟum Atukku veṇṭum palapaṇṭaṅkaḷum
tirupparivaṭṭam tiruccāntu tirumeṟpūccu tiruviḷakku Eṇṇai tiruppaḷḷittāmam tānattār pūcikkum nampimār koyilatikāri koyiṟṟkkaṇakku cimāheśvarakkaṇakku māhecurar vai Ūravar tevaraṭiyār Ivarkaḷ peṟum Oṭukkum parivaṭṭam tirumeykāval m paṇiyumaṟṟuc cāttuṅkūli cipātamtāṅkuvārkūli paṇiĀḷ viḷakkuāḷ kūli tirumalai
Digital edition of SII 7.470 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
